name: PEPER
additional_notices: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
Welcome to PEPER, the spiciest meme coin clubhouse for all you degens out there! Kick back in our exclusive token haven, stack up those $PEPER coins, and soak in the chill vibes with dank rewards. Level up in the Club and watch your $PEPER tokens multiply like crazy.
Boost your Peper, become the ultimate digital socialite, and earn more tokens while you’re at it. Ready to ride the funkiest, freshest, and most degen-friendly meme coin wave? Join the PEPER party and let’s yeet this wheat.
